# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The color of the content view’s background.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

This color is used to paint areas inside the content view that aren’t covered by the document view.

## Related Documentation

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the clip view’s background.

## Managing Graphics Attributes

- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean that indicates whether the scroll view draws its background.
- **borderType**: A value that specifies the appearance of the scroll view’s border.
- **documentCursor**: The content view’s document cursor.
